title: USC's Jake Olson presented by Head & Shoulders
itunes:title: USC's Jake Olson presented by Head & Shoulders
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by former USC long-snapper Jake Olson, who played Pac-12 football despite losing his sight to cancer at age 12. The pair discuss the state of Pac-12 (2:55), before Jake shares his story: losing his sight during middle school to playing for the USC Trojans (6:19). The group talk more football, discussing USC (17:47), The Raiders (23:30), the state of the college football playoff (31:25), and the NFC West (41:24). Finally, the podcast wraps up as Jake discusses how Head & Shoulders helped Jake to formulate the next chapter of his life as a motivational speaker (51:17).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
